title: SPY + TSL + RIME PLATOON
description: Three is the magic number when it comes to SPY + The Seventh Letter collaborations, and the third features a burner on SPY's most recognizable oversized snow goggle—the Platoon—by graffiti artist Jersey Joe, aka RIME. Adorned with RIME's trademark characters, the SPY + TSL + RIME Platoon bleeds his trademark graffiti style on both the inside and outside of the goggle strap, is accented with unique loop labeling and carries the RIME tag of approval in the form of his signature logo emblazoned onto the lens. With classic graffiti style and an irreverent approach to everything he does, the SPY + RIME Platoon is part of the ever-evolving curation between the world-renowned Seventh Letter Crew and SPY.
